Hello Connections,We are hiring for the hashtag#ML/NLP Engineer position:Experience : 6+ YearsLocation : RemoteNotice Period : Immediate joiners within 15 Dayshashtag#ML/hashtag#NLP Engineer (Core Focus: Revenue Intelligence & Pattern Identification) Key Experience & Expertise: Strong background in hashtag#NLP, especially intent/entity extraction, conversational analytics, and text classification. Proven skills in real-time event-driven architectures (WebSocket, gRPC, event sourcing patterns). Experience developing agent-based or rules-based guidance/intervention systems. Deep understanding of authentication, authorization, and security best practices. Experience with database schema design and integration patterns (relational/non-relational). Comfortable with DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, Docker containers, Kubernetes, or similar orchestration technologies.4. hashtag#Frontend/Full Stack Engineer (Core Focus: Dashboards, Analytics, User-Facing Experience) Key Experience & Expertise: Expert-level experience building intuitive, responsive dashboards and visualization systems using frameworks like React or Vue.js. Experience integrating analytics data visualization tools (e.g., Recharts, D3.js, Tableau integration, Power BI embedding, etc.). Familiarity with UX principles to collaborate effectively with your Product Designer. Comfortable connecting frontend systems to backend APIs, ensuring real-time updates and seamless user experiences.Interested can share your updated resume with details to #saggam.gayatri@dataqinc.com
